projects.title: SWAG.
projects.descriptionOne: SWAG is an online apparell and accessories ecommerce website that believes in the democracy of style and making high quality products that can withstand anything in the streets while also maintaing your own unique look.
projects.descriptionTwo: With an easy to use layout that supports both desktop and mobile devices, you can effortlessly navigate the website and find exactly what you are looking for.

projects.title: devtodo
projects.descriptionOne: With a simple ui and no need to create an account or login, this application was built with laziness in mind and allows a quick and easy way of creating any sorts of list for whatever you need

projects.title: Pomodoro Timer
projects.descriptionOne: Managing your time is an important skill to utilize. It can boost your productivity and help you manage large tasks so you can really get Sh*#! done!
projects.descriptionTwo: With a simple ui and easy to understand timeline, this pomodoro application is a suitable tool for anyone trying to manage or accomplish an effective workflow and time use

projects.title: Restaurant Reservations
projects.descriptionOne: Keeping track of  reservations and customer information has never been easier. With a couple clicks you have the ability to manage active, upcoming and cancelled reservations. You also have the power to update customer & reservation information at any time
projects.descriptionTwo: With an easy to use layout and labeled containers, it makes creating, updating, and cancelling reservations easier than ever, resulting in a stress free interaction.

projects.title: Batch Forum.
projects.descriptionOne: Learn About React, Typescript, Database Management, Graphic Design, Hardware and development
